ROUGE.description: The ROUGE metric is the recall based standard summarization metric. It was introduced by Lin et al. in 2004.

BLEU.description: The BLEU metric is the precision based standard machine-translation metric. It was intriduced by Papineni et al. in 2002.

METEOR.description: The METEOR metric is used as a amchine-translation metric. It is invented by Banerjee et al. in 2005, to address the weaknesses of BLEU.

BERTScore.description: The BERTScore metric is intended as a machine-translation metric. It is introduced by Zhang et al., in 2019 and is based on cosine similarities between contextual word embeddings retrieved from using a RoBERTa model.
